document.full_text: film star sienna miller's privacy and harassment claim against the news of the world over alleged phone-hacking by its reporters was settled for 100,000 pounds damages on tuesday.
document.title: sienna miller settles phone-hacking claim
lines_and_colors: film star sienna miller's privacy and harassment claim against the news of the world over alleged phone-hacking by its reporters was settled for 100,000 pounds damages on tuesday.
